info.author: Ilya Shalyapin
info.description:
Unwind
======

Converts XML to Python objects.


Installation
------------

    pip install unwind


Example
-------

We have following XML file and we desire to parse it::

    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
    <page>
        <menu>
            <name aaa="bbb" ccc="ddd">Привет мир</name>
            <items>
                <item>
                    <name rel="lala">Пункт 1</name>
                    <url>http://example1.com</url>
                </item>
                <item>
                    <name>Пункт 2</name>
                    <url>http://example2.com</url>
                </item>
            </items>
        </menu>
        <spec-sy.mbols>Символы</spec-sy.mbols>

    </page>

In Python:

Load XML from file::

    >>> import unwind
    >>> page = unwind.parse("example.xml")

Load XML from string::

    >>> xml = """
            <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
            <root />
        """
    >>> page = unwind.fromstring(xml)

Get some text::

    >>> page.menu.name.get_text()

Get some attrs::

    >>> page.menu.name['aaa']
    >>> page.menu.name['ccc']

Get list::

    >>> page.menu.items.get_children()

Iterate through a list::

    >>> for item in page.menu.items:
    >>>     print item.name.get_text()
info.name: unwind
info.html_description:
Converts XML to Python objects.

Installation

pip install unwind

Example

We have following XML file and we desire to parse it:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<page>
    <menu>
        <name aaa="bbb" ccc="ddd">Привет мир</name>
        <items>
            <item>
                <name rel="lala">Пункт 1</name>
                <url>http://example1.com</url>
            </item>
            <item>
                <name>Пункт 2</name>
                <url>http://example2.com</url>
            </item>
        </items>
    </menu>
    <spec-sy.mbols>Символы</spec-sy.mbols>

</page>

In Python:

Load XML from file:

>>> import unwind
>>> page = unwind.parse("example.xml")

Load XML from string:

>>> xml = """
        <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
        <root />
    """
>>> page = unwind.fromstring(xml)

Get some text:

>>> page.menu.name.get_text()

Get some attrs:

>>> page.menu.name['aaa']
>>> page.menu.name['ccc']

Get list:

>>> page.menu.items.get_children()

Iterate through a list:

>>> for item in page.menu.items:
>>>     print item.name.get_text()
